Description:
Requirements:Bachelors Degree in any relevant field.
At least 3-5 years of experience as a Customer Service professional in Supply Chain, Distribution and/or Logistics.
Knowledge and experience in freezone processes and documentation would be highly preferred.
Well versed MS Office and Outlook.
Experience and background in SAP/Oracle system.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Flexible and ability to thrive in a fast-paced work environment.
Available to join immediately.Job Details
